title: Uncut red topaz

properties.name: description
properties.value: Uncut red topaz is a type of semi-precious gem that can be cut with a chisel by a player with 16 Crafting, although there is a high chance that the player will accidentally crush it. Successfully cutting a red topaz grants the player 25 Crafting experience, but if they crush the gem they will receive only 6.3 Crafting experience.

Item ID1629

Uncut red topaz is a type of semi-precious gem that can be cut with a chisel by a player with 16 Crafting, although there is a high chance that the player will accidentally crush it. Successfully cutting a red topaz grants the player 25 Crafting experience, but if they crush the gem they will receive only 6.3 Crafting experience.

Uncut red topaz can be obtained in only a few ways. The most common way to obtain them is through Gem rocks either in Shilo Village or during Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup, but one can also obtain them from completing hard Gnome Restaurant deliveries or from stealing from Dorgesh-Kaan Rich Chests.

Red topaz is used in the creation of jewellery, and can be cut into red topaz bolt tips for use in creating red topaz bolts.

Cut red topaz may be sold to Gabooty's Tai Bwo Wannai Cooperative for 120 trading sticks, while uncut may be sold for 24. The gem is also used to create a Red topaz machete by trading in a gout tuber and 3 red topazes along with 1200 trading sticks to Safta Doc, which fulfills a medium Karamja Task.

Cutting chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to successfully cut a red topaz is: ( level − 1 ) ∗ 150 / 98 + 91 256 {\displaystyle {\frac {({\text{level}}-1)*150/98+91}{256}}} [1]

Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut red topaz 2,013, and the price of red topaz 2,498, the minimum crafting level to break even or better when flipping red topaz is 77.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{Infobox Item |name = Uncut red topaz |image = [[File:Uncut red topaz.png]] |release = [[27 January]] [[2003]] |update = Shilo Village Quest online |members = Yes |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |destroy = Drop |examine = This would be worth more cut. |value = 40 |weight = 0.003 |exchange = Yes |id = 1629 }} [[File:Uncut red topaz detail.png|left|130px]] '''Uncut red topaz''' is a type of semi-precious gem that can be cut with a [[chisel]] by a player with 16 [[Crafting]], although there is a high chance that the player will accidentally crush it. Successfully cutting a red topaz grants the player 25 Crafting [[experience]], but if they crush the gem they will receive only 6.3 Crafting experience. Uncut red topaz can be obtained in only a few ways. The most common way to obtain them is through [[Gem rock]]s either in [[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]] or during [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]], but one can also obtain them from completing hard [[Gnome Restaurant]] deliveries or from stealing from [[Dorgesh-Kaan Rich Chest]]s. Red topaz is used in the creation of jewellery, and can be cut into [[red topaz bolt tips]] for use in creating [[red topaz bolts]]. Cut [[red topaz]] may be sold to [[Gabooty]]'s [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cooperative]] for 120 [[trading sticks]], while uncut may be sold for 24. The gem is also used to create a [[Red topaz machete]] by trading in a gout tuber and 3 red topazes along with 1200 trading sticks to Safta Doc, which fulfills a medium [[Karamja Tasks|Karamja Task]]. ==Cutting chance== The chance to successfully cut a red topaz is: \frac{(\text{level}-1)*150/98+91}{256}{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1084600993038389248|date=13 January 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/HYHsC|archivedate=14 June 2019}} {{Skilling success chart|label=Gem cutting rates |label1=Opal|low1=128|high1=250|req1=1|color1=gray|image1=Opal.png |label2=Jade|low2=100|high2=245|req2=13|color2=green|image2=Jade.png |label3=Red topaz|low3=90|high3=240|req3=16|color3=pink|image3=Red topaz.png }} Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut red topaz {{Coins|{{GEP|Uncut red topaz}}}}, and the price of red topaz {{Coins|{{GEP|Red topaz}}}}, the minimum crafting level to break even or better when flipping red topaz is {{GemBreakeven | uncut = {{GEP|Uncut red topaz}} | cut = {{GEP|Red topaz}} | r = 1.5306122449 | beta = 91 | gamma = 256}}. ==Products== {{Uses material list|Uncut red topaz}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Uncut red topaz}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Uncut red topaz}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 24 July 2007 |update = King's Ransom |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Uncut red topaz detail (historical).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Uncut red topaz detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Uncut red topaz (historical).png|center]] |[[File:Uncut red topaz.png|center]] |- |29 March 2004 ⁠–
